verses.verse: And it came to pass, when Jabin <WH2985> king <WH4428> of Hazor <WH2674> had heard <WH8085> <WH8800> those things, that he sent <WH7971> <WH8799> to I-yovab <WH3103> king <WH4428> of Madon <WH4068>, and to the king <WH4428> of Shimron <WH8110>, and to the king <WH4428> of Achshaph <WH407>,

And to the kings <WH4428> that were on the north <WH6828> of the mountains <WH2022>, and of the plains <WH6160> south <WH5045> of Chinneroth <WH3672>, and in the valley <WH8219>, and in the borders <WH5299> of Dor <WH1756> on the west <WH3220>,

And to the Kanahanite <WH3669> on the east <WH4217> and on the west <WH3220>, and to the Amorite <WH567>, and the Hittite <WH2850>, and the Perizzite <WH6522>, and the Y'vusi <WH2983> in the mountains <WH2022>, and to the Hivite <WH2340> under Hermon <WH2768> in the land <WH776> of Mizpeh <WH4709>.

And they went out <WH3318> <WH8799>, they and all their hosts <WH4264> with them, much <WH7227> people <WH5971>, even as the sand <WH2344> that is upon the sea <WH3220> shore <WH8193> in multitude <WH7230>, with horses <WH5483> and chariots <WH7393> very <WH3966> many <WH7227>.

And when all these kings <WH4428> were met together <WH3259> <WH8735>, they came <WH935> <WH8799> and pitched <WH2583> <WH8799> together <WH3162> at the waters <WH4325> of Merom <WH4792>, to fight <WH3898> <WH8736> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, Be not afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> because <WH6440> of them: for to morrow <WH4279> about this time <WH6256> will I deliver them up <WH5414> <WH8802> all slain <WH2491> before <WH6440> Yisra'EL <WH3478>: thou shalt hough <WH6131> <WH8762> their horses <WH5483>, and burn <WH8313> <WH8799> their chariots <WH4818> with fire <WH784>.

So Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> came <WH935> <WH8799>, and all the people <WH5971> of war <WH4421> with him, against them by the waters <WH4325> of Merom <WH4792> suddenly <WH6597>; and they fell upon <WH5307> <WH8799> them.

And the YY <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> them into the hand <WH3027> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, who smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them, and chased <WH7291> <WH8799> them unto great <WH7227> Zidon <WH6721>, and unto Misrephothmaim <WH4956>, and unto the valley <WH1237> of Mizpeh <WH4708> eastward <WH4217>; and they smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them, until they left <WH7604> <WH8689> them none remaining <WH8300>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> did <WH6213> <WH8799> unto them as the YY <WH3068> bade <WH559> <WH8804> him: he houghed <WH6131> <WH8765> their horses <WH5483>, and burnt <WH8313> <WH8804> their chariots <WH4818> with fire <WH784>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> at that time <WH6256> turned back <WH7725> <WH8799>, and took <WH3920> <WH8799> Hazor <WH2674>, and smote <WH5221> <WH8689> the king <WH4428> thereof with the sword <WH2719>: for Hazor <WH2674> beforetime <WH6440> was the head <WH7218> of all those kingdoms <WH4467>.

And they smote <WH5221> <WH8686> all the souls <WH5315> that were therein with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, utterly destroying <WH2763> <WH8687> them: there was not any left <WH3498> <WH8738> to breathe <WH5397>: and he burnt <WH8313> <WH8804> Hazor <WH2674> with fire <WH784>.

And all the cities <WH5892> of those kings <WH4428>, and all the kings <WH4428> of them, did Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> take <WH3920> <WH8804>, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and he utterly destroyed <WH2763> <WH8689> them, as Mosheh <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765>.

But as for the cities <WH5892> that stood <WH5975> <WH8802> still in their strength <WH8510>, Yisra'EL <WH3478> burned <WH8313> <WH8804> none of them, save <WH2108> Hazor <WH2674> only; that did Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> burn <WH8313> <WH8804>.

And all the spoil <WH7998> of these cities <WH5892>, and the cattle <WH929>, the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> took for a prey <WH962> <WH8804> unto themselves; but every man <WH120> they smote <WH5221> <WH8689> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, until they had destroyed <WH8045> <WH8687> them, neither left <WH7604> <WH8689> they any to breathe <WH5397>.

As the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> Mosheh <WH4872> his servant <WH5650>, so did Mosheh <WH4872> command <WH6680> <WH8765> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, and so did <WH6213> <WH8804> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>; he left <WH5493> nothing <WH1697> undone <WH5493> <WH8689> of all that the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> Mosheh <WH4872>.

So Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> took <WH3947> <WH8799> all that land <WH776>, the hills <WH2022>, and all the south country <WH5045>, and all the land <WH776> of Goshen <WH1657>, and the valley <WH8219>, and the plain <WH6160>, and the mountain <WH2022> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and the valley <WH8219> of the same;

Havahn from the mount <WH2022> Halak <WH2510>, that goeth up <WH5927> <WH8802> to Seir <WH8165>, even unto Baalgad <WH1171> in the valley <WH1237> of Lebanon <WH3844> under mount <WH2022> Hermon <WH2768>: and all their kings <WH4428> he took <WH3920> <WH8804>, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them, and slew <WH4191> <WH8686> them.
Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> made <WH6213> <WH8804> war <WH4421> a long <WH7227> time <WH3117> with all those kings <WH4428>.

There was not a city <WH5892> that made peace <WH7999> <WH8689> with the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, save the Hivites <WH2340> the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Giv`on <WH1391>: all other they took <WH3947> <WH8804> in battle <WH4421>.

For it was of the YY <WH3068> to harden <WH2388> <WH8763> their hearts <WH3820>, that they should come against <WH7125> <WH8800> Yisra'EL <WH3478> in battle <WH4421>, that he might destroy them utterly <WH2763> <WH8687>, and that they might have no favour <WH8467>, but that he might destroy <WH8045> <WH8687> them, as the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> Mosheh <WH4872>.

And at that time <WH6256> came <WH935> <WH8799> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, and cut off <WH3772> <WH8686> the Anakims <WH6062> from the mountains <WH2022>, from Hevron <WH2275>, from Debir <WH1688>, from Anab <WH6024>, and from all the mountains <WH2022> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, and from all the mountains <WH2022> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> destroyed them utterly <WH2763> <WH8689> with their cities <WH5892>.

There was none of the Anakims <WH6062> left <WH3498> <WH8738> in the land <WH776> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: only in Gaza <WH5804>, in Gat <WH1661>, and in Ashdod <WH795>, there remained <WH7604> <WH8738>.

So Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> took <WH3947> <WH8799> the whole land <WH776>, according to all that the YY <WH3068> said <WH1696> <WH8765> unto Mosheh <WH4872>; and Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> it for an inheritance <WH5159> unto Yisra'EL <WH3478> according to their divisions <WH4256> by their tribes <WH7626>. And the land <WH776> rested <WH8252> <WH8804> from war <WH4421>.
